title: CNBC Daily Open: The bank rout continues. The Fed might still raise rates anyway
description: Bank stocks had a very rough Monday in the aftermath of Silicon Valley Bank’s implosion. The 2-year Treasury yield plummeted.

title: Consumer inflation may have cooled in February but only slightly
description: Consumer inflation may have cooled off a little in February, but economists expect it is still running at a high pace.

title: Australia to receive nuclear-powered submarines under agreement with U.S., UK
description: U.S. President Joe Biden, U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese came to the agreement at a meeting in San Diego, Calif.

title: Regulators may still try to find a buyer for Silicon Valley Bank, source says
description: There's still an opportunity to sell Silicon Valley Bank according to the official, saying that's not off the table.

title: Jeffrey Gundlach says Fed will hike funds rate next week to save credibility — but shouldn't
description: While Gundlach sees more tightening ahead, he doesn't think that's the appropriate response right now as regulators' rescue programs are inflationary in nature.

title: Something broke, but the Fed is still expected to go through with rate hikes
description: Markets still expect the Fed to keep up its inflation-fighting efforts, despite high-profile bank failures that have rattled the financial system.

title: Pfizer CEO says it will be able to deliver Seagen's cancer therapy at a scale not seen before with $43 billion deal
description: Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla said it will deliver Seagen's cancer therapy to the world at a scale that hasn't been seen before with its $43 billion acquisition.

title: Why regulators seized Signature Bank in third-biggest bank failure in U.S. history
description: The swift move shocked executives of Signature Bank, said board member and former congressman Barney Frank.

title: Charles Schwab shares drop 11%, but rally off lows as firm defends financial position
description: Schwab defended its financial position, reiterating that it has plenty of access to liquidity and a low loan-to-deposit ratio.

title: First Republic tells CNBC the bank isn't seeing that many depositors leave, JPMorgan funding working
description: Jim Herbert, First Republic's executive chairman, told Cramer that the bank was not seeing massive outflows of deposits and was operating as usual.

title: Investors rush into bonds, gold in flight to safety after SVB rescue
description: Investors flocked to safe-haven assets amid an emergency plan to backstop the banking system and limit the impact from the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank.

title: 2-year Treasury yield posts biggest 3-day decline since aftermath of 1987 stock crash
description: U.S Treasury yields declined on Monday as investors assessed the state of the economy after the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank.

title: 'A huge relief': Startups react to Silicon Valley Bank UK's HSBC rescue deal
description: "We can look our teams in the eye ... and say, not only will we be able to make next payroll but we can continue business as usual," said one startup founder.

title: First Republic drops 60%, leads decline in bank stocks despite government's backstop of SVB
description: First Republic Bank led a decline in bank shares Monday that came even after regulators extraordinary actions Sunday evening.

title: Silicon Valley's 'greed and avarice' have 'finally come home to roost' in SVB collapse, trader says
description: "Banking should be boring, a lot like watching paint dry — and any time it's not, you've got a problem," one investor told CNBC.

title: Stablecoin USDC nearly regains $1 peg after Circle says $3.3 billion held with SVB will be available
description: Circle, which issues USD Coin (USDC), said that the $3.3 billion it held with the now-collapsed SVB will be "fully available" on Monday when U.S. banks open.

title: Silicon Valley Bank collapse hits startups as far away as China
description: The Silicon Valley Bank fallout has ripple effects on Chinese startups.

title: Luxury automaker Porsche issues growth outlook after record 2022 earnings
description: Luxury carmaker Porsche AG sets long-term target of more than 20% of return on sales.

title: Britain's BBC battles mutiny in its sports department after social media clash
description: Gary Lineker, a former England soccer player-turned TV host and the organization's highest-paid star, posted a comment on Twitter Tuesday in response to the U.K.'s latest immigration policy.

title: Bill Ackman says U.S. did the 'right thing' in protecting SVB depositors. Not everyone agrees
description: Billionaire investor and Pershing Square CEO Bill Ackman said the U.S. government's intervention to protect depositors after the implosion of SVB is "not a bailout."

title: Bitcoin jumps 10% with crypto market topping $1 trillion as U.S. creates backstop for SVB depositors
description: Cryptocurrencies rallied on Monday as the U.S. government moved to protect depositors of the collapsed Silicon Valley Bank and HSBC bought the bank's U.K. arm.

title: HSBC buys Silicon Valley Bank UK, protecting deposits
UK's taxes are at a 70-year high. But its finance minister won't splash the cash at upcoming Budget
description: British Finance Minister Jeremy Hunt will deliver the government's Budget commitments on Wednesday against a better-than-expected economic backdrop.

title: Italy's own version of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is shaking up politics in Rome
description: Elly Schlein was elected as the leader of the center-left party Partito Democratico — the first female to get the job.

title: A tidal power 'mega project' in one of Europe's iconic waterways could power 1 million homes. But costs are huge
description: The scope and scale of the Mersey Tidal Power Project is huge.

title: CNBC Daily Open: What SVB means for markets
description: Silicon Valley Bank collapsed on Friday. Financial regulators stepped in on Monday to ensure people can access their deposits. What does this mean for markets?

title: In his first address, China's new premier says high quality growth is a priority
description: China's new premier Li Qiang said China's focus was shifting to what it calls high-quality development, such as building up tech and so-called green industries.

title: SVB collapse will have limited impact on Asia, but one analyst says it could be a warning sign
description: Analysts say the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank is not likely to have a major contagion effect in Asia, but one person says it could be seen as a "warning," an analyst said.

title: Goldman Sachs no longer expects the Fed to hike rates in March, cites stress on banking system
description: Goldman Sachs no longer sees a case for the Federal Reserve to deliver a rate hike at the FOMC's March meeting, economist Jan Hatzius said.

title: What the failures of Signature, SVB and Silvergate mean for the crypto sector
description: The failure of crypto-focused banks once again showed the vulnerability of stablecoins, which can lose their peg in unusual financial situations.

title: Wall Street — not taxpayers — will pay for the SVB and Signature deposit relief plans
description: The funds to reimburse depositors will be paid out of the Deposit Insurance Fund, which is made up of quarterly fees assessed on financial institutions.

title: Silicon Valley Bank signed exclusive banking deals with some clients, leaving them unable to diversify
description: Silicon Valley Bank required some clients to agree to exclusivity clauses, disabling them from diversifying where they held their money, SEC records show.

title: CNBC Daily Open: What Silicon Valley Bank means for markets
description: Silicon Valley Bank collapsed on Friday. Financial regulators stepped in on Monday to ensure people can access their deposits. What does this mean for markets?
